articles.title: NASA on high alert! Two huge asteroids on a collision course with Earth today - Moneycontrol
articles.description: NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL) is currently tracking two asteroids, 2024 SD3 and 2024 SR4, both set to pass Earth on 3 October 2024.
